Pycatima's documentation
======================
Catima is a C++ library for the calculation of the energy loss, range, angular scattering and time of flight of the particle passing through a matter. The pycatima package exposes this library to Python using pybind11.

See <https://github.com/hrosiak/catima> for more information.
